pageContext.claim: “We had one candidate, who turned out not to be too good a candidate, right? Beto. Remember? So he wanted to get rid of religion, the Bible.”
pageContext.analysis: Former Rep. Beto O'Rourke (D-Tex.) proposed to eliminate tax-exempt status for churches which did not recognize same-sex marriages. He did not say he wanted to get rid of religion or the Bible.
